name: Underground Rootine
description: Peace, love and harmony. Life could be so easy. If it wasn´t for those underground dwelling creatures. They love to nib on the big tree´s roots. But a plant with a root cut in half is close to extinction. Now it´s your turn to step in and defend the tree! Take control over the defensive roots and prevent the enemies from approaching the root heart. Plan your defense and activate the diefferent trap´s skills at the right moment. If the two of you work together you might end up being the hero of our beloved 'Great Parsnip' plains!
